attributes.action: Do not add fluoride to our drinking water.
attributes.additional_details:
1) Fluoride has many known negative side effects and has been linked to various serious illnesses. 
2) Healthy adult kidneys excrete only 50 to 60% of the fluoride ingested each day (Marier & Rose 1971); the remainder accumulates in the body.
3) 97% of the Western European population have rejected water fluoridation.
4) The dose cannot be controlled.
5) The British Government’s York Review estimated that up to 48% of children in fluoridated areas worldwide have dental fluorosis in all forms, with 12.5% having fluorosis of aesthetic concern (McDonagh, 2000).
attributes.background:
We do not wish to have fluoride added to our drinking water.
Many European countries have rejected water fluoridation, including: Austria, Belgium, Finland, France, Germany, Hungary, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Northern Ireland, Norway, Sweden, Switzerland, Scotland, Iceland, and Italy.
